channel.title: AltcoinTrading.NET Airdrops
channel.description: Crypto Airdrops and Deals by AltcoinTrading.NET

item.title: All LIVE Airdrops, Bounties and Competitions
item.description:
Airdropped Token or Opportunity Airdrop Date About the airdrop Link
Huobi Token campaigns 4 weeks, 1st run started 12 Jan Huobi Token (HT) is a DeFi asset on the Huobi Ecological Chain (HECO). You can get a wallet address to receive the tokens in Huobi exchange. Huobi is giving out rewards for Twitter activity, blogging, YouTube content creation and Telegram activity. Rules on bitcointalk. rules
Bitfresh bounty program Started 10 Jan Bitfresh is giving out token for Twitter follow and retweets. The more followers you have, the more tokens you get. Full rules on bitcointalk. rules
Earn YoBit's YoDefi tokens Live YoBit set up their own defi project for liquidity on the exchange. The exchange pays out 777 YoDefi Tokens proportionally for all users every 10 mins. sign up
QUAI DAO Accelerator Bounty 4 Jan 2021 - 18 Feb 2021 The tokenized DEFI accelerator Quai Dao is running social media bounty. Tokens are distributed via Telegram bot for social media follows. sign up
Psyche.Cash Bounty Campaign Continues Ongoing The DEFI project Psyche.Cash runs a set of social media bounties. You get tokens for follow, comments, content creation or bitcointalk signatures. Sign up via bitcointalk. sign up
CUDOS Ranger Bounty - Callout for participants Dec 2020 The platform cudos.org is looking for ambassadors with social media presence for their new program. Chosen ambassadors will get to create educational content about crypto (defi, trading, mining, dev) and earn between $200-$1000 worth of tokens a month. link to google form
XRP Holders: get Flare airdrop on Bitfinex 12 Dec 2020 Bitfinex will support the distribution of Flare Networksâ€™ upcoming airdrop of Spark (FLR) tokens for XRP holders. sign up
Staking without KYC on WhiteBit New! WhiteBit opened 17 different staking plans with 9 different currencies to choose from. 40% APR, available to the users without KYC. (Be mindful of risks) sign up
Opportunity: DeFi Tokens on reputable exchange with lower fees 14 days after listing The Aussie exchange Independent reserve is listing new DeFi tokens these days. For each of the new markets has the fee reduced to 0.1% for the first 2 weeks. Currently those markets are yearn.finance, Aave and Kyber Network Crystal. sign up
LATOKEN Earn Nov 2020 10+ new Telegram airdrops available on LATOKEN exchange under "Earn" in the top navigation bar. (SAND, UNO, BXT, PZS, L2L, BIOG, DGB, OAP...) If you sign up with the link here you get 50 USD fee credit. sign up
Opportunity: Trade DeFi Tokens with NO FEES 14 days after signup The token exchange WhiteBit gives you 14 days of zero-fee trading if you sign up with a shill link. No KYC until 2 BTC/day withdrawal limit, lots of new DeFi projects get listed there. sign up
item.author: airdrops@altcointrading.net
